data.title: Medical Consultation Website Modernization
data.description: Redesign of a medical consultation website using Angular.
data.details: I worked on the restructuring and modernization of a medical consultation website at Galáxia Digital, migrating from plain JavaScript to Angular. The transformation included improvements in interface, usability, and performance, resulting in a more modern and functional design.

data.title: Website Development for a Mattress Company
data.description: Development of a website for a mattress company using Angular.
data.details: I was responsible for creating and optimizing the website for a mattress company, using Angular to replace the existing plain JavaScript code. The project resulted in a more sophisticated design, an enhanced user experience, faster navigation, and a more modern look.

data.title: Queue Reduction and Sales Increase
data.description: Implementation of improvements in the payment system.
data.details: I worked on optimizing the payment process at Grupo Panvel, allowing transactions to be completed directly at the counter. This change drastically reduced queues and positively impacted sales.

data.title: Bug Fixing and Quality Assurance
data.description: Identifying and fixing issues before release.
data.details: I conducted continuous testing and early problem detection at Grupo Panvel, ensuring the delivery of more stable and secure code, minimizing production failures.

data.title: User Experience Improvement
data.details: At Grupo Panvel, I worked on interface optimization to make new system workflows more intuitive and efficient. I improved the payment process and adapted the interface to facilitate user adoption, ensuring a smoother and more accessible experience.

data.title: Code Review and Code Quality
data.description: Code review to ensure reliability and performance.
data.details: During my time at Grupo Panvel, I actively participated in code reviews, identifying critical issues and suggesting improvements. These practices helped maintain cleaner, standardized, and higher-performing code, ensuring safer and more efficient deliveries.

data.title: Development of an Internal Platform for Startups
data.description: Creation of an internal system for startup management.
data.details: I was responsible for developing an internal platform for startups at Grupo Panvel, eliminating reliance on third-party software. The project brought more autonomy and control over processes, allowing for more efficient and personalized management.

data.title: AI Exploration for Document Processing
data.description: Automated conversion of PDFs into structured strings.
data.details: At Grupo Panvel, I explored the use of Artificial Intelligence to automate document processing. I developed a system capable of extracting and structuring data from PDFs, optimizing internal processes and reducing the need for manual intervention.

data.title: Front-End Development for Panvel's Website
data.description: Worked on the website interface using Angular and NgRx.
data.details: I worked on the development of Panvel's website using Angular, NgRx, and RxJS, ensuring a dynamic and responsive interface. Additionally, I implemented automated tests with Cypress and Jasmine, guaranteeing quality and stability of delivered functionalities.

data.title: Store Management and Multifunctional Support
data.details: At Clica Combustível, I was responsible for managing the convenience store, ensuring organization and smooth operation. Additionally, I took on multifunctional roles, assisting as a cashier and gas station attendant when needed.

data.title: IT Management and Technical Support
data.details: At Clica Combustível, I was responsible for maintaining the IT infrastructure, diagnosing and repairing computers. I also managed the network and internal systems, ensuring the continuous and efficient operation of the store.

data.title: Camera and CCTV Monitoring
data.details: I was responsible for managing the security camera system at Clica Combustível, ensuring operational integrity and actively contributing to incident prevention.
